name: James Sterling
bio: Cambridge Computer Science alumnus with 15+ years in cybersecurity. Previously led digital identity initiatives at Barclays and advised the UK Government on secure authentication standards.

name: Dr. Eleanor Vance
bio: PhD in Computer Vision from Oxford. Former DeepMind researcher specializing in facial recognition ethics and spoofing detection. Brings deep academic rigour to our AI stack.

name: Arthur Pendelton
bio: Imperial College London graduate who scaled engineering teams at Monzo and Revolut. Expert in building high-availability distributed systems for regulated UK financial markets.

name: Sarah Kensington
bio: LSE graduate with a background in RegTech. Specialized in FCA compliance and identity verification workflows for the UK and European markets.
